rows.label: tlk70000069_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I think there's still a ton of treasure
out here in Dannagh Desert, just
waiting to be found...

rows.label: tlk70000069_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I've been thinking about hiring an
adventurer with a taste for mining to
help me find some.

rows.label: tlk70000069_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You guys had a Blade that was good
at mining, didn't you?

rows.label: tlk70000069_02_msg0004
rows.name:
If so, I think you'll be able to find lots
of buried treasure. Not just here, but
in all sorts of other places, too.

rows.label: tlk70000069_02_msg0005
rows.name:
If I find any treasure before you,
though, don't think I'm just going to
hand it over!
